We are progressing slowly.. but still miles to go..! Happy Republic Day everyone! Jai Hind 🇮🇳
A post shared by Kriti (@kritisanon) on Jan 25, 2019 at 8:57pm PST
title: A Nation Like No Other! Celebs Share Heartwarming Messages To Mark India's 70th Republic Day
